title: Dennis Skinner – 2019 Twitter Statement Following Loss of Seat
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the Twitter statement made by Dennis Skinner on 13 December 2019 after losing the constituency of Bolsover to the Conservative Party.
content:
Sad day, for me.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

But, most of all for all those who worked so hard to make life better.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

We’ll be back, bigger, better and stronger.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
